TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable
Public NotInheritable Class DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle Implements ICloneable
public ref class DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle sealed : ICloneable

Docs.summary: Contains border styles for the cells in a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制可以完全自定义其外观，包括单元格和标头的边框。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>允许你设置的单元格边框外观的属性。 但是，如果你需要进一步自定义边框，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>类允许您设置的每条边的单元格的边框的样式。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>分别表示左、 右、 上边框和的单元格、 下边框。 可以设置这些属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>来生成各种单元格之间的边框外观。
## Examples 下面的代码示例调整单元格边框的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>以便双边框分离开来的内部单元格和左上方标头单元格的行和列的标头。 此示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A>方法，与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustedTopLeftHeaderBorderStyle%2A>属性。 这些成员使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>对象，从而修改各个单元格边框。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle/CS/advancedborderstyle.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle/VB/advancedborderstyle.vb#0)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the border style for all of the borders of a cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>属性未设置为相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>值，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>属性值是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet>。
